Text.Page:
, although we failed to blast Exodor, we're still trying to find a way to stop it.

We have a new discovery about Exodor. Please come to me as soon as you see this order.

â€” Ryshan

When explosives weren't the answer, the federation searched for a different solution to stop Exodor.
With the help of the ecologist Amarre, the federation discovered a way to get inside Exodor. You went with Amarre and Titus to Exodor.

I've been expecting you.

Although the Mysterium has thrown every resource it's got at investigating Exodor, we're still a long way off finding a way to stop Exodor from the outside.

On top of that, Exodor seems to be making its way towards Velika.

If that happens, the Valkyon Federation and all of Arborea will be in danger.

But it's too early give up just yet. If it can't be destroyed from outside then there's got to be another way, right?"Is there another way?"

You'll never guess who's found a weak spot in the impenetrable fortress known as Exodor.

Amarre!

According to her report, the Murderwings and Mournwings have a homing instinct.

Here, read it for yourself. "What should I to do?"

There are some captured butterflies in this box.
If you release them, you can fly to Exodor on them.

I never thought I'd see a Murderwing so closely. Thank you - both you and Amarre.

It's a relief to have a way inside Exodor. You should be able to stop Exodor from the inside.

Titus and Amarre should be useful. Please take them with you and find a way to stop Exodor.

I guess I'm also suddenly joining this special unit... as the leader. Hehe.

I'm actually pleased and a little excited to be going to Exodor like this."It'll be dangerous."

I know that. But the people have suffered enough from the effects of the crystals and these butterflies.

We must investigate Exodor and find a clue to end all this.

"I hope we do."
Was someone else coming? Someone called Titus. We met each other just a while ago. He looks very confident about this.

What? Amarre? That ecologist is coming with us? On such a dangerous mission? This is no job for a scholar, if you ask me.

I won't stop her from coming, but I hope she doesn't get in our way.

So this is Exodor...
Fascinating!

We should take a look around.
